p: This delay is especially relevant for MERS patients, as they have a much shorter median time interval between symptom onset and death than do SARS patients 139, 42. The use of recombinant interferon Î²-1b, which has the lowest EC 50/Cmaxratio against MERS-CoV among tested preparations of recombinant interferons, should be evaluated in combination with other effective antivirals in clinical trials at early stages of the infection 83, 84.
